roleset.name: inability to be detected
roleset.note: IMPERCEPTIBILITY-N, IMPERCEPTIBLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.

example.name: imperceptibility-n
example.text: This strong emphasis on our senses as the principal source of all knowledge makes the imperceptibility of the soul very problematic.

example.name: imperceptible-j
example.text: Magnitude 3 or lower earthquakes are mostly almost imperceptible or weak and magnitude 7 and over potentially cause serious damage over larger areas , depending on their depth .
